detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/IdleFulcrumV2.sol#301-307):
	- (success) = recipient.call.value(amount)() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/IdleFulcrumV2.sol#305)
Contract iERC20Fulcrum (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/IdleFulcrumV2.sol#499-592) is not in CapWords
Parameter IdleFulcrumV2.redeem(address)._account (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/IdleFulcrumV2.sol#740) is not in mixedCase

owner() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/IdleFulcrumV2.sol#446-448)

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/IdleFulcrumV2.sol#472-475)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/IdleFulcrumV2.sol#481-483)
